content: get the fashionable look of a triangle scarf or shawl without having to worry about shawl pins or wrapping it correctly just slip it over your head and go you can add fringe or tassels easily to it or leave it as is the pattern is written out step by step and starts by working in row then joining to work in the round it looks great in solid or variegated colors and is a perfect one skein pattern you can use worsted weight or dk weight i used a 6 5mm crochet hook but you can use any size hook as long as you meet gauge or roughly meet gauge too tight of gauge and too many stitches or row in your 4x4 in swatch will result in a smaller finished product which would better fit a teen or child gauge is 13 double_crochet stitches and 8 double_crochet row in a 4 inch by 4 inch square stitches used are double_crochet slanted puffs fpdc and bpdc instructions included for the slanted puffs pattern is suitable for an adventurous beginner or intermediate crocheter pattern is written using us terminology copyright © is owned by pixie hollow yarn designs please do not alter or change this pattern in any way and claim it as your own please credit pixie hollow yarn designs in your finished work when possible please join our facebook group for the first look at upcoming patterns discounts on paid patterns giveaways hand dyed yarn sales or if you are interested in testing new patterns
